tab1.text1:
Full PVP 6PM - 10PM MT Weekdays and all Weekend (No structure damage otherwise)
PVP okay to anyone and their tames 24/7

Rules are posted in Discord and must be followed.

Joining Discord is required (link below).

Basically, treat others and their property as you would like to be treated... 

<TextStyle.Green>We are glad you are here!</>

tab2.text1:
16X Taming
9X Harvesting (3 x Prime Meat(s))
3X  XP
0.25X Mating Interval
30X Maturation
1X Hatching
14 minute  Cuddle Interval
5X Imprinting
1X Hexagon Reward
3X Loot Drop Quality

Examples:
Argentavis: 11m incubation, 1h48m maturity, mating cooldown 4h to 12h, 2 imprints required for 100%
Rex: 18m incubation, 3h5m maturity, mating cooldown 4h to 12h, 3 imprints required for 100%
